channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Sand Leaking Out of the Bag: Eroding American Influence
item.description: This week, Bill Reinsch examines how U.S. partners have looked beyond the United States to diversify their trading relationships and reduce their holdings of U.S. bonds.

item.title: Three Truths About the End of New START and What It Means for Strategic Competition
item.description: The expiration of New START does not necessarily foretell an arms race or a massive U.S. nuclear buildup. Instead, the expiration of the treaty may be an opportunity for a new era of arms control.
